name: 張正春
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解通訊系統的理論基礎及原理。本課程著重於類比系統。課程內容包含：(1) Fourier series and Fourier transform, (2) Signals and linear systems, (3) Linear modulation techniques, (4) Stochastic process and power spectral density, (6) Modeling of noise and its effects on communication systems
schedule:
Course Schedule (tentative):
Week	Topic	Memo
1	Overview and history
2	Fundamental of signals and Fourier series
3	Fourier series and Fourier transform	Hw1
4	Power spectral density and correlation
5	Signals and linear systems	Hw2
6	Sampling theory
7	Modulation techniques: linear modulation	Hw3
8	AM, FM, PLL, PPM, PWM, PCM, and delta modulation
9	MIDTERM
10	Multiplexing
11	Review of probability theory
12	Stochastic process	Hw4
13	Correlation and power spectral density
14	Linear systems and random process 	Hw5
15	Narrowband noise
16	Noise effect in modulation system: SNR and signal degradation	Hw6
17	Noise effect of AM, FM, and PCM systems
18	FINAL
materials:
（一）主要讀本 (Main textbook)：
1.	Rodger E. Ziemer, Principle of Communications Systems, Modulation, and Noise, 6th Edition, John Wiley, 2009. (ISBN: 978-0-470-39878-4)
（二）參考書目 (Other reference)：
1.	John G. Proakis, Contemporary Communication Systems Using Matlab and Simulink, 2nd Edition, CL-Engineering 2003. (ISBN: 0-534-40617-3)
